Game.Name: Animal Snap - Rescue Them 2 by 2 (USA)
Game.plot: Animal Snap is a Puzzle game, developed and published by Ignition Entertainment, which was released in 2002.http://www.gamefaqs.com/portable/gbadvance/home/583060.htmlCheat: Unlock Block Blaster bonus gameAt the title screen, hold the ''L'' shoulder button and press UP, DOWN, LEFT, RIGHT, RIGHT, LEFT, DOWN, UP on the D-pad.
